titlStmt.titl: Cougar GPS collar data in west-central Alberta

citation.biblCit: Beale, Meghan M; Widmeyer, Samantha L; Boyce, Mark S, 2019, "Cougar GPS collar data in west-central Alberta", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/QPVCWU, UAL Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:bb4tXZEutNt/BQ6Wsyf10Q== [fileUNF]

titlStmt.titl: Cougar GPS collar data in west-central Alberta

stdyInfo.abstract: Cougar GPS data collected for n = 7 cougars in west-central Alberta by M Beale and S Widmeyer between March 2017 - October 2018.
stdyInfo.notes: 'fix.no' is the unique numerical identifier for each fix made by an individual, in sequential order (based on when the fix was made) 'local.date' is the local date (YYYY-MM-DD) for when the GPS fix was made 'local.time' is the local time (HH:MM:SS) for when the GPS fix was made 'latitude.wgs84' is the latitude of the GPS fix in geographic coordinate system World > WGS 1984 'longitude.wgs84' is the longitude of the GPS fix in geographic coordinate system World > WGS 1984 'individual' is the unique identifier for each of the 7 cougars (M = male, F = female)
